name: Identity Crisis
text: Forced Response: After you change form, place 1 crisis counter here. Then, if there are 5 or more crisis counters here, find Shadow of the Past and reveal it. If you cannot, place 3 pursuit counters on Pursued by the Past. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Hank Pym and choose to take 1 damage or place 1 threat on the main scheme for each crisis counter here → discard this obligation.

name: Return of the Prodigal Son
text: Forced Response: After the player phase ends, place 1 seize counter here. Then, if there are 2 or more seize counters here, remove all seize counters from here and place the upgrade or support in play with the highest cost facedown under here. [star]Boost: Reveal this card.

name: Ultron
text: Stalwart. Villainous. When Revealed: Find the set-aside Seized Control attachment and reveal it. If you cannot, Seek a [[hacked]] card from the encounter deck and reveal it. (Wasp’s nemesis minion.) [star]Boost: Exhaust an upgrade you control.

name: Seized Control
text: Attach to Ultron. Otherwise, attach to the villain When Revealed: Place the card you control with the lowest cost facedown under this card. Otherwise, discard this card. Forced Interrupt: When the attached character would take any amount of damage, place it here instead. Then, if there is at least X damage here, discard this card. X is equal to the resource cost of the card placed under here.

name: Take Over Signal
text: Treat attached ally as a [[hacked]] minion with a blank text box. Attached minion's SCH is equal to its printed THW and it does not take consequential damage. When Revealed: Attach to the ally you control with the hightest cost. Otherwise, seek an ally from your deck. Put that ally into play engaged with you with Take Over Signal attached to it.

name: Submit or Perish
text: When Revealed: Exhaust each upgrade you control. If fewer than 2 upgrades were exhausted this way, search the encounter deck and discard pile for the Ultron minion and put it into play engaged with you. Otherwise, this card gains surge.
